sentences.en: Browning's prediction is no better than a wild guess.
sentences.cn: 勃朗宁的预测不过是妄加猜测而已。

sentences.en: Change my life because some freakshow made a prediction 400 years ago?
sentences.cn: 为了四百年前疯狂的举动而改变我的生活?

sentences.en: Considerations of this kind let to a prediction and a gamble.
sentences.cn: 这类考虑导致猜测和冒险.

sentences.en: He was unwilling to make a prediction about which books would sell in the coming year.
sentences.cn: 他不愿意预测来年哪些书会有销路。

sentences.en: It was another case of the preconception fathering the prediction.
sentences.cn: 这可以说又是按先入之见做出预言的一例.

sentences.en: No methods are available for the accurate prediction of the effect of bends and fittings.
sentences.cn: 精确地预计弯头和管件的影响尚无方法可循.

sentences.en: Recently it makes a sizable dent in this prediction.
sentences.cn: 这一预言最近有了很大进展.

sentences.en: The correlation is loose and the use for prediction insecure.
sentences.cn: 这种相关是不密切的,而且用来预测是靠不住的.

sentences.en: The data can be used to make useful economic predictions .
sentences.cn: 这些数据可用于进行有用的经济预测。

sentences.en: The departures of an actual image from the prediction of simple theory are called aberrations.
sentences.cn: 实际的象与简单理论所预期的象的偏差,叫做象差.

sentences.en: The outcome of the election was correspondent with my prediction.
sentences.cn: 选举结果与我的预计一致.

sentences.en: The prediction has unfortunately come true.
The stumbling block is the mechanistic prediction of cloud cover.
sentences.cn: 麻烦的是对云量的机械预报.

sentences.en: They were accurate in their prediction that he would change her life drastically.
sentences.cn: 他们预测得没错，他使她的生活发生了翻天覆地的变化。

sentences.en: This great prediction is coming true.
sentences.cn: 这一伟大的预言即将成为事实.

sentences.en: Weather prediction has never been a perfect science.
sentences.cn: 天气预报从来都不是完美的科学。

words.tran_cn: 作出预言；作预料，作预报

trans.tran_cn: [气]预测，预报，预言，预言的事物
trans.tran_en: a statement about what you think is going to happen, or the act of making this statement
